OrgName.entry: ROSHNI SHEFFIELD ASIAN WOMENS RESOURCE CENTRE

Desc.entry: A resource centre run by and for South Asian women in Sheffield, which actively promotes the needs of local Asian women through self-help, employment, advocacy, information provision, cultural, health and wellbeing activities. Aims to actively encourage South Asian women to be self-reliant through empowering them to identify their own needs, make their own choices and create their own solutions. Provides a youth work service and mentoring service for young women, an advocacy service for women in need of practical and emotional support and an engagement project to help learners into employment. Has a project for older women and carers. Holds events, leisure activities and summer activities. A registered charity.
